name: Primal Wrath Demo
description:
PRIMAL WRATH
Primal Wrath is a survival game that progresses according to choices.
You will lead a retired politician named Matthew Holland. He left the city for a while. And went to the Bardolf's farm a little bit far from the city.
He was glorious for doing this. 1 day after his departure from the city began a large outbreak. The worst part was that he left his wife and two sons in the city.
Now unaware of anything, with people he can trust. He has to find his family.

My illustrators are working hard to make drawings of the game. And I need money for more illustrators and music producers.

https://www.patreon.com/keremaygun

Please Support My Job On Patreon...
